```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(readr)
require(ggplot2)
require(GGally)
require(dplyr)
```

```{r load, include=FALSE}
cns = read_csv("../data/cns/cns_meld_sch.csv")
cns_sub = cns %>% 
              filter(ncompo>30000) %>%
              select(c("trad_word", "RT", "ERR", "nsenses",
                           "degree", "closeness", "betweenness",
                           "eigen", "ncompo")) %>%
              mutate(nsenses=log(nsenses),
                     degree=log(degree+1),
                     betweenness=log(betweenness+1),
                     eigen=log(eigen+1))
```

```{r data}
head(cns_sub)

```

```{r plot}
ggpairs(cns_sub, columns=2:(ncol(cns_sub)-1))
```
